title: Lie Detector: True or False Fingerprint Scanner FREE
features: This is an application that can detect lies through the touch screen and by detecting the following physical changes in the body of the person being interrogated
Detect lies through changes in emotional state
description: The Lie Detector Polygraph Plus is a game of ‘tell me a story’ and ‘I'll tell you if it’s true or false (a lie or the truth)This is an application that can detect lies through the touch screen and by detecting the following physical changes in the body of the person being interrogated:* Changes in emotional state* Blood pressure* Mood detection* Finger sweating* Finger temperatureWhether someone is lying or telling the truth, you’ll know it.Just place a finger (preferably the thumb) on the fingerprint sensor, interrogate your suspects and then ask them to remove their finger.The Lie Detector Polygraph Plus has all the answers you need (in a binary way) .Investigate the truth about the sex or gender of a person; ask about the veracity of a romance; get to know your true friends; find out who deceives you; confirm the truth in a game of truth or dare.The future is in your hands with the Lie Detector Polygraph Plus.Sure ... remember that this application can’t really do any of what I said. Simply use it to have fun with your friends and family!
